data.text: Special thanks for Mrs Lika in the reception for her outstanding support and  service provided it is reflected to positive in my experience staying in four points hotel.  Thanks for your management and wish you a great future . Best regards , ,
data.title: Dubai time

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Faisal,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience with us! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time at our hotel. Your kind words mean a lot to our team, and we're delighted to have exceeded your expectations. It was our pleasure to serve you, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful experience.

If there's anything specific you loved or any suggestions you have, feel free to share—we always appreciate valuable feedback.

Regards,

Hazem Mohamed
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel ManagementDXB

data.text:
Had an amazing experience along with my girlfriend at the four points in Dubai. The service from the reception was exceptional with the personnell always making sure we had exactly what we needed. The cleaning of the room as well was truly well done. Always 100 after when we returned in the afternoon, well done Rana.

Thank you for the stay, looking forward coming back again.
data.title: Exceptional Dubai experience

data.text: Excellent Service! Stayed here with 2 friends and had breakfast at Purani Dilli. The breakfast buffet had a good spread with lots to eat. Shout out to Shamsher, Abdullah and Anum. They made sure the food was replenished often. You guys were awesome Keep up the Good work!!!
data.title: Excellent service

data.text: Very delicious! Mr. Vineet is very kind and warm! Very clean beautiful place! And spicy food is very appropriate for me. . Thanks for the good hospitality provided by vineet ,I will get back to you for sure. And Mr. Sai as well nice server really appreciated I will come tomorrow as well for lunch
data.title: Dinner

data.text:
We would like to thank the management and staff for a warm and hospitable five night stay:

Hazem front office manager. Your friendly demeanor and professionalism made a great impression. Thank you for going out of your way to accommodate our requests. Your exceptional service is greatly appreciated! 

Cheerful Shailesh for always greeting us with a smile. 

Verna and Saish. Your exceptional service and friendly conversations made our dining experience memorable. To the chefs and kitchen staff, thank you for the wonderful meals!

Asia, Refraat, Mahmoud, Ritesh, Nelly. The helpful faces of the hotel. Your kindness and the extra mile to ensure our comfort and satisfaction didn’t go unnoticed!

Each day, returning to a beautifully maintained room was a joy. 

Thank you for your excellent service!
data.title: Warm Hospitality
